title: Redeploy backend and frontend canisters (no functional changes)

requirements.text: Perform a redeploy by rebuilding and upgrading the backend canister, regenerating backend bindings, rebuilding the frontend, and deploying the frontend canister, following the existing redeploy runbook/scripts.
acceptanceCriteria: Running the redeploy process completes without errors (backend build, backend upgrade, binding generation, frontend build, frontend deploy).
Post-deployment verification checks pass: backend canister status is Running, frontend canister status is Running, and the backend query call `listRooms` succeeds.
No functional code changes are introduced as part of the redeploy.

constraints: Do not introduce functional code changes during the redeploy (deployment-only operation).
Keep all Motoko logic within the existing single-actor architecture (backend/main.mo).

Do not modify files under frontend immutable paths (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui).
nonGoals: Adding or changing application features (e.g., chat behavior, message visibility rules).
Schema/state migrations unless required by an intentional functional change.
